THINGSPEAK_CHANNEL_ID.description: ThingSpeak channel ID to read data from

THINGSPEAK_WRITE_KEY.description: ThingSpeak write key to write data to

THINGSPEAK_READ_KEY.description: ThingSpeak read key to read data from

IFTTT_URL.description: IFFTT URL to send notification to

NODERED_USERNAME.description: Username to login to Node-RED editor

NODERED_PASSWORD.description: Password to login to Node-RED editor
